article.title: Black River to Advance WOLFJAW Systemâ€™s Geolocation Capability
article.text: Black River Systems Co. Inc., Utica, New York, has been awarded a $7,999,778 modification (P00004) to previously awarded contract FA8750-15-C-0039 for geolocation of theater-wide intelligence collection. Contractor will provide development of new capabilities for the already capable Advanced Wideband Processing WOLFJAW system by focusing on the advancement of geolocation techniques, specific signals for collection and improving the existing capabilities using new consumer off-the-shelf technology. Work will be performed in Utica, New York, and is expected to be complete by February 4, 2019. Fiscal 2015 research, development, test and evaluation funds in the amount of $330,000 are being obligated at the time of award. The Air Force Research Laboratory, Rome, New York, is the contracting activity (FA8750-15-C-0039).
